import React from 'react' import {Link, useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; import {useSelector} from "react-redux"; import { AiOutlineShoppingCart } from "react-icons/ai"; const Nav = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const {totalQuantities} = useSelector(state => state.CartReducer) const jwt = localStorage.getItem('jwt') const logout = () => { localStorage.removeItem("jwt") navigate('/login') } return (
    { jwt? <>
  • HOME
  • Logout
    • : <>
  • HOME
  • TIN TỨC
  • GIỚI THIỆU
  • LIÊN HỆ
    • }
{totalQuantities}
) } export default Nav
